Price: $25.29 - $22.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:18:19 UTC – Details)

Product Description

18 UNITS DOG TOYS FOR PUPPIES AND SMALL DOGS.

Bestdoggo Super Value Toys Pack for Dogs, Help Your Dog Get More Fun, and Protect Your Home.

Dog loves to chew thing, especially puppy, they love to chew around when they feel lonely or teeth growing, give your dog our dog toy, let them play with the toy, not your shoes, clothes, underwear, or furniture.

Dogs love our toy, it’s a great gift for your beloved dogs.

Why do you need our toys?

Building relationship

You can play fetch or hiding game with your dog, it‚Äôs a great way to build relationship with your dog, makes your dog loves you more!

Teeth cleaning

No-toxic material rubber toy is a good toy for puppies and small dogs to chew.

Durable and fun to play with

18 pcs durable dog toys, it’s multifarious and colorful, your dog will love our toys.

Easy to wash

Our toys are washable.

18 pcs in one bag, one time purchase with long last.

Quantity
18 Units 7 Units 6 Units 1 Units

Package Dimensions ‚Äè : ‚Äé 10.79 x 9.53 x 3.94 inches; 1.43 Pounds
Date First Available ‚Äè : ‚Äé April 3, 2022
Manufacturer ‚Äè : ‚Äé Bestdoggo
ASIN ‚Äè : ‚Äé B09V26ML4B

„ÄêSafe and High Quality„ÄëGreat interactive and training toy, you can play fetch and hiding game with your dog, enhance the relationship between you and your dogs.Build energy and health, helps dog solve boredom and anxiety separation, protect furniture from dog chewing.
„ÄêGreat for Dental Health„ÄëClean teeth, clean your dog’s teeth, make your dog healthier, by chewing the rubber toys and rope toys, dog could get gum massage and stress relief.
„ÄêDesign for Small Dogs and Puppies„ÄëPremium material with built-in squeaker, no glue and non-toxic material, safe and fun, great for puppies.„ÄêNOTE!„ÄëNOT for aggressive chew dogs, our toys designed for puppies small and medium-sized dog.
„ÄêService from Us„ÄëWe are so certain that your dog will love these small dog toys. If you have any questions about products, please feel free to contact us, we will always be ready to serve you.
„ÄêNOTE!„ÄëPlease note! These toys set is not suitable for large dogs, aggressive dogs. The toys cannot be eaten. No toy is indestructible. Do not leave toys with unsupervised pets. Remove and replace toy if damaged. At the same time, we suggest that the owner pay attention to the damage of the puppy toy in time.

item.title: SmartPetLove Snuggle Puppy Heartbeat Stuffed Toy – Pet Anxiety Relief and Calming Aid
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) From the brand Snuggle Puppy Reducing stress and anxiety for over 1,000,000 pets We design our products to speak to your pet‚Äôs natural instincts in ways that alleviate anxiety, promote play and provide comfort and calm. For over two decades Snuggle Puppy has successfully reduced stress and anxiety for over ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $35.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 03:06:53 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Snuggle Puppy

Reducing stress and anxiety for over 1,000,000 pets

We design our products to speak to your pet‚Äôs natural instincts in ways that alleviate anxiety, promote play and provide comfort and calm.

For over two decades Snuggle Puppy has successfully reduced stress and anxiety for over 1,000,000 pets.

How did we get our start?

Our Michigan based company began in 1997. Ever since we’ve been helping pets and pet parents with problems such as separation anxiety, traveling, crate training, and more.

What makes our products unique?

We design our products to speak to your pet‚Äôs natural instincts in ways that alleviate anxiety, promote play and provide comfort. Snuggle Puppy has become a much-needed friend for over 1 million pets.

Why do we love what we do?

We’ve helped hundreds of shelters and organizations bring comfort to the animals waiting to be adopted through our Snuggle Puppy Cares program.

Click to View Products

Original Snuggle Puppy

Since 1997 Snuggle Puppy has helped over 1,000,000 dogs by reducing barking, whining and anxiety

Snuggle Puppy Starter Kits

Contains an Original Snuggle Puppy, 3 Heat Packs, Snuggle Puppy Blanket, Puppy‚Äôs 1st Toy, and Puppy Teething Aid

Click to View Products

Tender-Tuffs

Tough plush dog toys made with TearBlok technology to extend playtime

Bounderz

Designed for durable, lasting interactive fun and engagement with an unpredictable bounce

Snuggle Puppy Grooming Tools

High quality grooming tools featuring non-slip handles and stainless steel

Snuggle Nuggets Treats

High Protein Freeze-Dried Dog Training Treats That Your Pup Will Love

Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‚Äè : ‚Äé No
Product Dimensions ‚Äè : ‚Äé 12 x 6 x 3 inches; 12 Ounces
Item model number ‚Äè : ‚Äé SP112
Batteries ‚Äè : ‚Äé 2 AAA batteries required. (included)
Date First Available ‚Äè : ‚Äé May 10, 2017
Manufacturer ‚Äè : ‚Äé SNUGO – pallet ordering
ASIN ‚Äè : ‚Äé B0722XGRMB

REDUCE NEGATIVE BEHAVIORS – Get more sleep! Helps with crate & kennel training by reducing barking, whining and anxiety for your dog, helping YOU sleep at night
EASY TO USE – Industry leading ‚ÄúReal-Feel‚Äù heartbeat with 2 modes; AAA batteries and simple to use Heat Pack included
CERTIFIED SAFE MATERIALS – Every Snuggle Puppy made from materials certified safe for human use; machine washable and easy to clean
SATISFACTION GUARANTEED – US based, our customer service is second to none. We promise our Snuggle Puppy will help your family: we stand behind that promise 100%

Ease Loneliness, Fear, and Separation Anxiety

The Snuggle Puppy recreates maternal intimacy with physical warmth and an advanced ‚ÄúReal-Feel‚Äù pulsing heartbeat with 2 modes (8-hour setting / 24-hour setting)

Meet The Original Snuggle Puppy: Your Dog’s New Best Friend For Life


The Original Comforting Heartbeat Toy for Dogs

Don’t Be Fooled…

Over 1 million dogs cuddled and comforted by the Original Snuggle Puppy and counting! Give your pet a reliable product that is tried-and-true for over twenty years. Give your pet the best with the Original Snuggle Puppy.

Certified Safe Materials

Each Snuggle Puppy is made from materials certified safe for human use; machine washable and easy to clean with the heart removed. Certified by STU Testing Service in June 2022.

Real-Feel Pulsing Heartbeat

Advanced “Real-Feel” dual mode pulsing heartbeat; our proprietary heart can be set to beat for 8 hours, or for 24-hour continuous use. With an easy access pouch to turn on/off heartbeat and insert a Snuggle Puppy heat pack inside of product (additional Snuggle Puppy heat packs available).

Pet Calming Solution

Comfort For Any Dog

The Original Snuggle Puppy is designed to provide comfort and helps relieve anxiety in your four-legged friend. Whatever the case; whether in the playpen, crate training, a new transition, traveling, fireworks, or perhaps a thunderstorm, rest assured the Original Snuggle Puppy is there to help.

All Natural, Without Medication or Restraint

Dogs and puppies are pack animals who are instinctively drawn to their mother and others in their pack. The Original Snuggle Puppy recreates that intimacy with physical warmth and a “real-feel” pulsing heartbeat, providing an extra source of comfort for your pet.

Over 1 Million Dogs Comforted Since 1997

Our US based customer response team is second to none and here to help. We promise our Snuggle Puppy will help your family, and we stand behind that promise 100%.

4.5
Price: $35.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 03:06:53 UTC – Details)
